Payment Point Online Banking
Indonesia, China, Philippines, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam and Thailand.
name: PPOB
title: PPOB

api_list.name: Check Status
Account
api_list.description: API Account is used to display user information according to the Token embedded in the header request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ppob.p.rapidapi.com/account"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ppob.p.rapidapi.com/account"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Deposit Nominal & Bank
api_list.description: API Deposit Nominal & Bank is used to display available deposit information on PulsaXpress as well as bank account information used for the deposit process. It also allows users to make a deposit by choosing the desired deposit amount and payment method.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ppob.p.rapidapi.com/payment/deposit"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ppob.p.rapidapi.com/payment/deposit"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Indonesia Credit Pricelist
api_list.description:
This Endpoint is for Indonesia only.
The Credit & Data Pricelist API is used to display the list of available credit and data prices on PulsaXpress. This information can be used to know the price of the products you want to buy before making a transaction. This price information can be updated according to the current prices and can be used to determine the prices offered on your application.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ppob.p.rapidapi.com/prabayar/pulsa/operator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ppob.p.rapidapi.com/prabayar/pulsa/operator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

message.postpaid: Masukkan Nomor Pelanggan Pasca Bayar Anda.
message.pulsa: Masukkan Nomor Tujuan, Pilihan Nominal akan di tampilkan sesuai dengan Operator Selular Anda.
message.games: Pilih Provider Game Anda dan pilih nominal voucher yang di inginkan, Voucher akan di tampilkan di Menu Notifikasi setelah transaksi
message.emoney: Topup ulang produk Uang Elektronik yang Anda miliki dengan Saldo Deposit Anda. Silahkan Masukkan Nomor Tujuan (HP) / Kartu E-Money & pilih Produk yang sesuai.
message.data: Masukkan Nomor Tujuan, Pilihan Nominal akan di tampilkan sesuai dengan Operator Selular Anda.
message.voucher: Gunakan deposit Mobilepulsa Anda sebagai voucher belanja / diskon di retail atau toko berikut. Kode Voucher akan di kirimkan ke Notifikasi
message.smstel: Masukkan Nomor Tujuan, Pilihan Nominal akan di tampilkan sesuai dengan Operator Selular Anda.

api_list.name: Internasional Credit Pricelist
api_list.description:
The Pricelist API is used to display all available Pulsa and Data products. The result of this API can obtain the Code, Name, Nominal, and Price of each available product.
Country Code
China China
Malaysia Malaysia
Philippines Philippines
Singapore Singapore
Thailand Thailand
Vietnam Vietnam
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ppob.p.rapidapi.com/prabayar/Singapore/operator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ppob.p.rapidapi.com/prabayar/{code}/operator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Topup Deposit
api_list.description:
This API is used to top up a user's deposit. Before making a deposit top-up, make sure you have obtained the nominal code and bank.
Key Description Type Required
deposit Nominal deposit sesuai dengan response list nominal String Yes
method Prefix bank sesuai dengan response list bank String Yes
nama Nama pemilik rekening pengirim String Yes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ppob.p.rapidapi.com/payment/deposit/topup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ppob.p.rapidapi.com/payment/deposit/topup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Login
api_list.description:
Create your account first using this [link  ](https://www.pulsaxpress.com/ref/rpdapi)

API Login allows you to obtain an Authorization Token which will then be used for every Action / Transaction on PulsaXpress.
api_list.code:
import requests

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ppob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Top-up Credit Prepaid Account
api_list.description:
API Topup is used to perform transactions with your customers. Before making a hit to the Topup API, make sure you have obtained a token during login.
